data.text: @ncdhhs This shot is hurting our kids. Stop pushing this poison. https://t.co/QvOaKkoOgm
@ncdhhs Y’all are doing this while Florida is saying it’s dangerous for children. God please help our children in NC and you all should be ashamed of yourselves.
@ncdhhs The Chinese flu is not a big deal. Nothing to worry about. Stop wasting everyone's time with this crap.
